desc.message: Experience the power of Ruffle - the Flash Player emulator that allows you to effortlessly run your favorite Flash games, playlists and more across the web! With this intuitive Flash Emulator, you can enjoy all your favorite content with ease and convenience in 2023.

settings_page_ignore_optout.message: Play Flash content even on sites that disable Ruffle

status_message_init.message: Checking Ruffle status on current tab…

status_result_disabled.message: Ruffle is not loaded because it was disabled by the user.

status_result_error.message: An error occurred when querying the current tab's instance of Ruffle.

status_result_optout.message: Ruffle is not loaded because the current page has marked itself as incompatible.

status_result_protected.message: Ruffle cannot load on protected browser pages.

status_result_running.message: Ruffle is loaded and running Flash content on the current tab.

status_tabs_error.message: An error occurred when looking up the current tab.
